quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Praise ye the God of gods
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Praise ye the Lord of lords
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who alone doth great wonders
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who made the heavens in understanding
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who established the earth above the waters
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who made the great lights
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ The sun to rule the day
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Confitēminī Dominō quoniam bonus: 9 ^ Lūnam et stellās in potestātem noctis
quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ The moon and the stars to rule the night
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Confitēminī Dominō quoniam bonus: 10 ^ Quī percussit Aegiptum cum prīmōgenitīs eōrum
quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who smote Egypt with their firstborn
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Confitēminī Dominō quoniam bonus: 11 ^ Quī ēdūxit Isrāēlem dē mediō eōrum
quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who brought out Israel from among them
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

et bracchiō excelsō
for he is good: quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ With a mighty hand and with a stretched out arm
for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Confitēminī Dominō quoniam bonus: 13 ^ Quī dīvīsit Mare Rubrum in dīvīsiōnēs
quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who divided the Red Sea into parts
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Confitēminī Dominō quoniam bonus: 14 ^ Et ēdūxit Isrāēlem per medium ejus
quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ And brought out Israel through the midst thereof
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

et virtūtem ejus in Marī Rubrō
for he is good: quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ And overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red Sea
for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Confitēminī Dominō quoniam bonus: 16 ^ Quī trādūxit populum suum per dēsertum
quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who led his people through the desert
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who smote great kings
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ And slew strong kings
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Sehon king of the Amorrhites
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ And Og king of Basan
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ And he gave their land for an inheritance
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ For an inheritance to his servant Israel
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Confitēminī Dominō quoniam bonus: 23 ^ Quia in humilitāte nostrā memor fuit nostrī
quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ For he was mindful of us in our affliction
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Confitēminī Dominō quoniam bonus: 24 ^ Et redēmit nōs ab inimīcīs nostrīs
quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ And he redeemed us from our enemies
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Who giveth food to all flesh
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Give glory to the God of heaven
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

quoniam in aeternum misericordia ejus. ^ Give glory to the Lord of lords
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.
